title: Camellia Road Tea Bar
description: My favorite boba spot! If you like strong tea flavor, this is for you. Also a really solid study spot!

title: Stella Jean’s
imgAlt: A scoop of ube ice cream from Stella Jean’s
description: My favorite ice cream spot, their ube ice cream is to die for!

title: Cesarina
description: An incredible pasta spot, freshly-made pasta, and complimentary focaccia bread is huge!

title: 8th and B Poke
imgAlt: A delicious poke bowl from 8th and B Poke
description: The greatest poke place of all time, small business!

title: Oscars Mexican Seafood
imgAlt: Seafood tacos from Oscars Mexican Seafood
description: Best place for seafood tacos, they don’t skimp on seafood! Taco especial is a must-try, and there is happy hour 2-5pm on weekdays.

title: Shan Xi Magic Kitchen
imgAlt: A bowl of biang biang noodles from Shan Xi Magic Kitchen
description: I am an absolute sucker for wide noodles, the wider the better. This spot serves authentic ‘biang biang’ noodles, the texture is incredible! You can spot locals, influencers, families, and college students here!
